product_name: Sierra Designs Lightning 2 UL Tent - 2014 Closeout
long_description: The ultralight Sierra Designs Lightning 2 UL Tent shelters 2 backpackers through 3 seasons with a protective awning and plenty of open-air living space for cooking and outdoor views in wet weather.
short_description: The ultralight Sierra Designs Lightning 2 UL Tent shelters 2 backpackers through 3 seasons with a protective awning and plenty of open-air living space for cooking and outdoor views in wet weather.
